actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend the Geothermal Steam Act of 1970 for the purpose of enhancing the development of geothermal resources situated beneath Federal lands.

summary.text: Amends the Geothermal Steam Act of 1970 to increase the maximum amount of acreage which may be conveyed to a single person, association, or corporation under a Federal geothermal lease in a single State from 20,480 acres to 51,200 acres.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Geothermal Steam Act of 1970 for the purpose of enhancing the development of geothermal resources situated beneath Federal lands.
